ygData.subject: Re: Guk expedition ??
ygData.msgSnippet: What the, are you crazy? NO ONE has fully explored lower Guk yet. Even those level 50 encounter some problem there. Scrape the idea!!! With my Enchanter, a
ygData.messageBody:
What the, are you crazy? NO ONE has fully explored lower Guk yet. Even those
level 50 encounter some problem there. Scrape the idea!!!

With my Enchanter, a Warrior, a Cleric and a Druid, we could only clear up to
the 2nd level before we decided to gate out (the warrior had a gate potion) and
we were on average at level 30+

Tolong lah, Upper Guk already has enough mesh to last you a century and you
still "equipment no enough" Want to be a munchkin is it?

BTW, The boots are at Najera, and only has a few charges. Najera is also a goood
place for you guy to visit.

Alex wrote:

> From: "Alex" <leealex@...>
>
> I have been postponing the trip to Guk for the foloowing selfish reasons :P
>
> 1) The lower guk has very mean monsters(2oth-30th lvl) that carries nice
> stuff: There my shopping list:
> a)collar of undead protection, 5hp,7 vs disease and poison,
> b)The Jorneyman boots-slightly slower than SOW, just click on it and
> run.-Very nice
> c) Silverplate plate bracers-+ 7hp (upperguk)
> d) Azure sleeves +12hp weight only 0.4 (lower guk)
> e) Kobold boots
> f) mesh , mesh mesh
> and the animated Hand that gives out ????
>
> 2) My lvl is only 17th , cant hit the lower guk yet. I can hit the upper guk
> Gaz, taz warriors for the mesh but the next time i go back to lower guk, my
> factions with them is so bad that any frogglock and Kolbold that will KOS me
> onsight. I hope to hit 20+ lvl go striagth into lower guk and storm the
> buggers.
>
> 3) Is so difficult to gather a group at the FIX day and time to hunt for at
> least 3-4 hrs, camp there and go back in again at a later time-Together and
> so on. It IS very important to be in Group.
>
> There my suggested list of personal in the Guk group
> a) at least 1 monk
> b) at least 1 Paladin
> c) 1 Shaman
> d) 1 Wiz
> c) 1 rogue
> d) anyone/any char
>
> Monk and paladin to tank, shaman to hit and buff, wiz to ROOT and hit -this
> 4 char r the mininum for a group. Xp is NOt the purpose. It the Goodies we
> all want. i say if u r below lvl 10th also can come for the adventure, thats
> if u dont mind the xp.
> Garren is now 18th Pal
> Leshrec is 17th Wiz, can made 18th by weekend, np
> Yiyang 17th Monk, may nit make 18th by weekend- got problem :P
> Trifrost 14th Shaman, can make 15th by weekend, np
>
> Some of u are experience in Guk eg, Garren ,Sereph and Leshrec, etc , your
> comments pls.
>
> Please add and correct on the above. Im open for the Expedition to Guk.
> Today is Thursday. Wanna meets on Saturday mornning?? I hve to log at
> 1:00pm and be back at 8:pm. suggestion please.
>
> Yiyang of Innoruuk
>
